html: President George H.W. Bush was a true American hero serving at very consequential times in the life of our country — from his time as the youngest Naval Aviator during World War II to his service as President when the world witnessed the fall of the Berlin Wall. #Remembering41

html: #FlorenceNC safety tips: - STAY INDOORS. Do not venture out during the storm. - Do NOT drive or walk through stagnant or moving floodwaters. - If your power goes out, do NOT operate gas powered generators or charcoal grills in or near your home. - Have your emergency kit ready!
text:
#FlorenceNC safety tips:
- STAY INDOORS. Do not venture out during the storm.
- Do NOT drive or walk through stagnant or moving floodwaters. 
- If your power goes out, do NOT operate gas powered generators or charcoal grills in or near your home.
- Have your emergency kit ready!

html: Brunswick County has declared a state of emergency. A mandatory evacuation for residents in low-lying and flood-prone areas, or in mobile or substandard homes, takes place 7 a.m. Tuesday. A voluntary evacuation will be in effect for other residents.
text:
Brunswick County has declared a state of emergency.

A mandatory evacuation for residents in low-lying and flood-prone areas, or in mobile or substandard homes, takes place 7 a.m. Tuesday.

A voluntary evacuation will be in effect for other residents.

Hurricane #Florence update
• Increasing risk of life-threatening impacts: storm surge at coast, flooding inland
• Dangerous winds could down trees & cause power outages

Stay tuned for #ncwxpic.twitter.com/YIN6OLA1KC
